data.comment: Today's referee, Jair Marrufo, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 8, In Portland, Portland push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Portland are in shooting range from this free kick.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 16, Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Portland needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Portland in the half of Seattle.
Jair Marrufo signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 24, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 26, Portland have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 28, Portland push forward at Providence Park and Marvin Loria gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Seattle defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Jair Marrufo signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
Free kick Seattle.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Portland.
In the minute 32, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Throw-in for Seattle at Providence Park.
In the minute 36, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Portland's area.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Sebastian Blanco for Portland drives towards goal at Providence Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Portland's Marvin Loria is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Portland.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Portland Portland attack through Sebastian Blanco. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Jair Marrufo will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Seattle at Providence Park.
In the minute 45, Portland to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 47, Raul Ruidiaz for Seattle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle are coming forward and Gustav Svensson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Portland.
Diego Valeri of Portland is pulled up for offside.
Jeremy Ebobisse of Portland gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 52, Seattle have a goal kick.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Seattle are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle have a dangerous throw-in.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 58, Marvin Loria of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Jair Marrufo awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Andy Polo is replacing Marvin Loria for Portland at Providence Park.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Seattle at Providence Park.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Jair Marrufo signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 66, Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Seattle's area.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 70, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Goal! Seattle have got their heads in front thanks to a Raul Ruidiaz strike.
In the minute 72, Great play from Joevin Jones to set up the goal.
Jaroslaw Niezgoda is replacing Jeremy Ebobisse for the home team.
The home team replace Eryk Williamson with Felipe Mora.
In the minute 74, Nouhou Tolo is on a sub for Joao Paulo for Seattle.
Portland needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick Seattle.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seattle have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portland close to the penalty box.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a second substitution, with Handwalla Bwana replacing Jordan Morris.
In the minute 81, Seattle make their third substitution with Will Bruin replacing Joevin Jones.
It's now 0-2 in Portland as Raul Ruidiaz scores for Seattle.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 85, Goal! Seattle extend their lead to 0-3 through Kelvin Leerdam.
Raul Ruidiaz with an assist there.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 87, Alex Roldan is replacing Cristian Roldan for the away team.
Portland make their fourth substitution with Cristhian Paredes replacing Sebastian Blanco.
Brian Schmetzer is making the team's fourth substitution at Providence Park with Miguel Ibarra replacing Raul Ruidiaz.
In the minute 88, Seattle pushes forward through Will Bruin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Nicolas Lodeiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Seattle.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Tomas Conechny of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Portland drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
That's full-time at Providence Park. The final score is 0-3.
The home team have replaced Jorge Villafana with Tomas Conechny. This is the fifth substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
